name: Level Design Jam 1 - Submissions
description:
This is a download of all the submissions to Level Design Jam 1, held on our Discord server (invite link: https://discord.gg/geFkdZW5vp)

Here's a 4-minute youtube video about the jam, showing clips of everyone's work, and talking about how we approached it:

And here's the link to Jam 2, starting on Monday 17th October: https://itch.io/jam/level-design-jam-2
